channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #ja @ 1465134076789071875
item.description:
こんにちは！
今日の東京は☀です。
ブログ更新しました🌈病院経営におけるオープンデータの使い方をご紹介します！
https://t.co/RhUycZcdgN
#営業 #企業公式相互フォロー #企業公式秋のフォロー祭り #企業公式が毎朝地元の天気を言い合う https://t.co/9pVOhgzEUC

item.title: #en @ 1465121602782257154
item.description: My guess is that Ontario's 5-11 doses are falling under "Undisclosed or missing" in the open data set. You can see the number of such cases began changing level on the 25th here. Looks to me like the province should be close to reporting them officially. (Toronto only shown) https://t.co/DhH9xBCBW7

item.title: #en @ 1465060523087699968
item.description:
For day 1 gappers (35%+) here are the probabilities of the premarket high being broken to the upside during regular trading hours.
Segmented by percentage "give-back", meaning the percentage difference between the premarket high and the Open.
Data since 2020+. 988 samples. https://t.co/uV6MGzjMM5

item.title: #en @ 1465032494055510020
item.description:
SpirOps @SPIROPS_AI shared a look at a cool tool in development that recreates cities procedurally from open data according to their footprint, height, and building year:
https://t.co/mD1bmfRG4e
#ai #ArtificialIntelligence #proceduralart #3dart #3dmodeling https://t.co/lWMHsT65AK

item.title: #tl @ 1465019329582452740
item.description: Have just processed @proteomeXchange dataset #PXD030000.A new milestone! Thanks to all submitters.#proteomics #opendata Dataset PXD000001- March 2012 PXD005000- Sept 2016 PXD010000- June 2018 PXD015000- Oct 2019 PXD020000- June 2020 PXD025000- March 2021 PXD030000- Nov 28th 2021

item.title: #en @ 1464984373627924493
item.description:
We had a wonderful weekend at #CTC24 with three teams working on #opendata projects.
The @opendata_sco team now have a live OD portal for Scotland, and a 10 month plan to develop it.
The Waste Wizards have bumped the number HWRCs massively on OpenWasteMap.
1/2

item.title: #it @ 1464978462410743816
item.description: Il ministero dell’Economia ha il compito di rendere accessibili i dati sull’attuazione del Pnrr, ma non è ancora chiaro entro quando lo farà. Questa data deve essere resa pubblica e soprattutto deve essere imminente #pnrr #draghi #governo #monitoraggio #opendata #opengovernment https://t.co/56MVYgZ4AW

item.title: #fr @ 1464921277945335808
item.description: Présents au #CampusBZH de Rennes, où notre député @ebothorel échange sur les rôles du parlementaire et sa mission sur l'open data. Le partage par défaut des données des administrations, s'il est voté dans la loi 3DS, changera concrètement la vie des administrés par son automacité https://t.co/4cCfY2KAKN

item.title: #fr @ 1464916982956912640
item.description: [#Data] Et si l’#OpenData et l’#OpenSource devenaient des leviers de la #TransitionÉcologique ? 🤩 ➡️ C’est le cas de @_datagir, un service conçu par l’@ademe et qui permet à chacun de mesurer son impact environnemental ! + d’infos avec @ConversationEDU 👉 https://t.co/0hYvdGoT28

item.title: #fr @ 1464909345330802689
item.description:
Olivier Véran compte atteindre les 10 millions d'habitants ayant reçu une dose de rappel à la fin de la semaine prochaine.
Jeudi soir (dernières données en open data), on était à 6,5 millions, dont 5,2 millions âgés d'au moins 65 ans. #Covid19 https://t.co/lj51esSaAF

item.title: #nl @ 1464907017462636553
item.description: @Ilse_Degreef @wduyck Ruzie maken? Nee hoor. Wetenschap. Tegenspreken op basis van argumenten, met expliciete verwijzing naar open data/informatie die dat tegenspreken wettigen en zelfs noodzakelijk maken.

item.title: #fr @ 1464904253470826497
item.description: @AnneCMailfert Merci de nous citer, open data ne veut pas dire open bar.

item.title: #en @ 1464893501292924928
item.description:
Today we join the celebration of the first-ever #MediterraneanDay with this mosaic of #Sentinel2 🇪🇺🛰 images acquired between August and October 2021
Proud that our #OpenData is used to monitor, preserve & better protect its ecosystems and supports #EUGreenDeal implementation https://t.co/h2KMnR05DV

item.title: #en @ 1464891762292498436
item.description: " genomic sequencing identified the new variant at high speed; thanks to open data-sharing, the global scientific community was alerted to it and has sprung into action" great reminder from @ewanbirney open data critical to pandemic response. https://t.co/SJDdCgMpiQ

item.title: #en @ 1464807613380509700
item.description: 🇫🇮Data just released out of Finland looking at incidence of infections requiring hospitalization by age and vaccination dose 1 or 2 (left) & further age stratified and shown over time (right). Info on natural immunity in tweet below. Very unique resource! https://t.co/pNCS1XNiHP https://t.co/LLFAVC73K6

item.title: #es @ 1464780483141775368
item.description: En los datos abiertos de este sábado 27/11 hay un visible aumento en casos activos COVID-19 en México, cambiando la tendencia de semanas anteriores. El aumento viene de más de la mitad de los Estados de la federación. https://t.co/YXUNsgoxqM

item.title: #en @ 1464772411144949765
item.description:
Environment Canada's weather models are being upgraded next week to version 8.0.0 -- once per year overhaul. (details forthcoming:https://t.co/PhkZOAYwv8)
The Canadian global model actually scores better than NOAA GFS w/5 day NHEMI forecasts over past year, significantly so. https://t.co/VyZaPhKcVO

item.title: #en @ 1464679931816779776
item.description: Excited to share our new manuscript. The idea for this project came from an ocean plastic voyage with @CapnMoore. We collaborated with undergraduates in the university to survey and cleanup trash in their own communities using a new high resolution method. https://t.co/iGZa6dzdqs

item.title: #es @ 1464674405594767362
item.description:
La semana pasada cumplí 8 años de trabajar en tecnología para el bien público.
Esta foto es de la primera conferencia donde hablé de Datos Abiertos y Género.
Las herramientas y el cabello cambiaron, pero la misión de crear tecnología que impacte positivamente al mundo continua. https://t.co/Va46PajWJH

item.title: #ja @ 1464603269565583364
item.description:
【2021年11月26日 九州地方の火山性地震】
九重山 1回 (11/18 1回) 阿蘇山132回 170⤵︎⚠️⚠️ 霧島山(えびの高原(硫黄山)周辺) 2回→ 霧島山(新燃岳)3回→ 桜島 2回↗︎‼️ (11/24 1回) 薩摩硫黄島 10回 6⤴︎❗️ 口永良部島 10回 3↗︎‼️‼️ 諏訪之瀬島 15回 7↗︎‼️
https://t.co/on808GLfue ﾒﾓ

item.description:
Der @MDR_SAN fragt, weshalb ich @LobbyLsa gebaut habe. Und warum #OpenData wichtig ist.
"Ich will zeigen, dass man mit Daten viel mehr anfangen kann, wenn man sie in einem sinnvollen und maschinenlesbaren Format veröffentlicht, statt in einer PDF-Datei."
https://t.co/6CFh7t0lhU

item.title: #en @ 1464392279116890113
item.description:
Did you know? The Graph encourages projects & developers to create open-source APIs called subgraphs, so that an open data economy can exist where anyone can access any data based on their requirements.
Learn how to build a subgraph here: https://t.co/MOhfybs4ky

item.title: #en @ 1464305362555879429
item.description:
Here's some interesting data from HRM Open Data
Vehicle-pedestrian Injury Collisions Jan to Sep
78 - 2021 - + 37% from 57 - 2020
But we know 2020 was depressed due to Covid-19 so let's compare to 2019
78 - 2021 - + 18% from 66 - 2019
So much for any downward trend.

item.description: Nous complétons les données disponibles en #opendata et largement partagées pour améliorer la connaissance de l’épidémie. item.description:

item.title: #es @ 1464196323872325647

item.title: #es @ 1464193184616136709
item.description:
La transparencia es esencial para mantener la confianza de los ciudadanos en las Administraciones

item.title: #en @ 1463960794153029646
item.description:
Really excited to be part of the Greek #opendata team under the coordination of @eellak @gfoss_en
Yesterday our plenary meeting held online. 12 teams (horizontal and sectoral) were created from more than 100 participants.
Results will be presented soon. Stay tuned!

item.title: #en @ 1463956192057778176
item.description:
Today at #GEOWeek2021, the @GEOSEC2025 Plenary adopted the Statement on Open Knowledge.
It emphasizes the concept of open science, and also of open access, citizen and participatory science, #opendata, software, hardware, and diversity of knowledge
👉 https://t.co/rlumkzAAC7 https://t.co/ZH3YH88j8M

item.title: #en @ 1463946129566056455
item.description:
Love the work @JaimeObregon is doing collecting public data and building tools that highlight government corruption and inefficiency in Spain
Open data activism feels like a good way to make everyone aware of the incompetence and bad intentions of the bureaucrats

item.title: #en @ 1463943586978930704
item.description: @KellyTKPK @MCPS @MoCoCouncilMD We definitely need a leader with vision to turn around the ship. There was a total lack of vision this summer, communications need a total overhaul, open data should be part of the policy, there should be listening sessions, and so much more!

item.title: #en @ 1463941829066383363
item.description: 4/ I wrote some days ago about $KILT being a day 1 member (identity work group) of @gaiax_aisbl, an organisation creating a sovereign open data eco against the current centralized data ecosystem. Close ties to big industry partners like BOSCH here! https://t.co/kqw3iKpja2
